thread.title: BT increases charges: how to escape the £12 price rise
thread.title_full: BT increases charges: how to escape the £12 price rise

author: Kate Palmer
title: BT increases charges: how to escape the £12 price rise
text: BT increases charges: how to escape the £12 price rise Landline rental and call charges will increase from September 20, affecting millions of broadband and phone customers The telecommunications giant is increasing prices from September, but customers will be able to switch penalty-free Photo: Alamy
